Posts.Content: Apr 2, 2018 02:21AM Cathymck wrote: My cancer stage 1 grade 1 0/6 nodes. Clean margins. I had double mx - tho no cancer in rgt breast. MO offered the oncotyoe test, but said I would have to affirm willingness to take chemo if the score was high. I couldn't say I would take chemo... so she did not order the test. She said my risk looked low and test would likely be low.
Posts.Title: anyone not get an oncotype test? kika2013 Cathymck
